name: orderTopia
tag_list: iphone-ordering, mobile-ordering, online-ordering, cloud-based, pos, social-network-integration, iphone
overview:
orderTopia provides cloud-based POS solutions for the restaurant and retail industries. orderTopia’s technology offers restaurants and retail stores iPhone and mobile ordering, online ordering, and social network integration. In contrast to other offerings, orderTopia integrates orders seamlessly into restaurantsâ€™ POS networks. The company provides a direct to Point of Sale solution, and not a phone-in or fax style system.

orderTopia is a software development company changing the way customers and merchants interact. The company is moving the point of sale from the brick and mortar storefront to iPhones, mobile phones and computers. orderTopia connects customers, restaurants, and retailers in new and unique ways.

In addition to offering iPhone and laptop ordering, orderTopia offers seamless social media network integration. orderTopia’s Open API will create direct connections to social media networks such as Twitter and Facebook from inside orderTopia. The API will enable features such as direct postings to Facebook and remote hashtag ordering from Twitter.

orderTopia has also built an internal social network to allow members to follow their friends, update their status, read reviews, and post recommendations (and photos and videos). orderTopia’s open API will sync this network to members’ outside networks such as Facebook and Twitter.
